name: hop_unittest

createUnitTestTask.name: createUnitTestTask
createUnitTestTask.comment:
Creates a hop_unittest/hop-core.Task which runs the unit tests defined by hop_unittest/hop_unittest.createUnitTestTask.unitTestAction.

hop_unittest/hop_unittest.createUnitTestTask.unitTestAction should be in the form void function().

hop_unittest/hop_unittest.createUnitTestTask.unitTestAction in the form void function(Configuration config) is deprecated.

packageIntro:
hop_docgen

Hop task for running unit tests based on unittest.
